title: Microsoft Bets Big: $23 Billion AI Investment with Focus on India
description: Microsoft announces a $23 billion investment in artificial intelligence, focusing on India as a major hub, with plans to boost cloud-computing capacity and equip millions with AI skills. The company also eyes $7.5 billion investment in Canada, amid global tech giants competing in AI infrastructure development.
content: Microsoft has unveiled a staggering $23 billion investment in artificial intelligence, earmarking a substantial $17.5 billion for expansion in India. The U.S. tech giant aims to bolster its cloud-computing presence, capitalizing on India's vast digit... [740 chars]

title: Ray-Ban Owner EssilorLuxottica Shares Fall on Google's Planned AI Glasses Launch
description:
By Joe Stonor

content:
By Joe Stonor
Shares in Ray-Ban owner EssilorLuxottica fell Tuesday after Warby Parker said it planned to launch the artificial-intelligence glasses it is developing with Google, intensifying competition in the smartglasses field.

title: OpenAI’s Secrets are Revealed in Empire of AI
description: On our 2025 Best Nonfiction of the Year list, Karen Hao’s investigation of artificial intelligence reveals how the AI future is still in our hands
content: Technology reporter Karen Hao started reporting on artificial intelligence in 2018, before ChatGPT was introduced, and is one of the few journalists to gain access to the inner world of the chatbot’s creator, OpenAI. In her book Empire of AI, Hao out... [7770 chars]

title: Leonardo DiCaprio takes a stand against Artificial Intelligence: “It is not a form of art”
description: Anything considered truly art must come from a human, the actor stressed
content:
Leonardo DiCaprio has positioned himself against Artificial Intelligence, emphasising that it cannot be regarded as a form of art.
In an interview with Time magazine, the Oscar-winning actor shared his views on the contribution of AI, noting that alt... [614 chars]

title: Adobe makes positive strides to help dispel generative AI disruption concerns: Stifel
description: Adobe shares have struggled during 2025, dropping 23% year to date as investors worry that the power of generative artificial intelligence could negatively affect its offerings for digital creators.
content:
